CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Taking advantage of the temperature - dependent aggregation effect , BHJ PSCs with PffBB-n:PC71BM as an active blend layer spin - coated at different temperatures were fabricated and investigated which showed considerably various photovoltaic performance.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| BHJ PSCs |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |

Explanation:

* BHJ PSCs (Bulk Heterojunction Photovoltaic Cells) is a type of material used in solar cells technology.
* PffBB-n is a material mentioned as an active blend layer in the given paragraph.
* PC71BM is another material mentioned as a component of the active blend layer in the given paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PffBB-n |
| PC71BM |

Explanation:

* BHJ PSCs (Bulk Heterojunction Photovoltaic Cells) is a type of technology or device, not a specific material.
* PffBB-n and PC71BM are the only clear material names mentioned in the given paragraph.
